alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Craighead and northwestern Mississippi Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caraway, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Gosnell, Manila, Lake City, Leachville, Monette, Caraway, Keiser, Dell, Little River, Etowah, Black Oak, Victoria, Jolliff Store, Delfore, Calumet, Dearman, Eastview, Lennie and Vail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
